metadata.og:description: W3Schools offers free online tutorials, references and exercises in all the major languages of the web. Covering popular subjects like HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Python, SQL, Java, and many, many more.

content.text: MySQL BETWEEN Operator
The MySQL BETWEEN Operator
The BETWEEN operator selects values within a given range. The values can be numbers, text, or dates.
content.html: The BETWEEN operator selects values within a given range. The values can be numbers, text, or dates.

content.text: The BETWEEN operator is inclusive: begin and end values are included.
content.html: The BETWEEN operator is inclusive: begin and end values are included.

content.text: BETWEEN Syntax

content.code_html:
SELECT column_name(s)
FROM table_name
WHERE column_name BETWEEN value1 AND value2;

content.text: Demo Database
Below is a selection from the "Products" table in the Northwind sample database:
content.html: Below is a selection from the "Products" table in the Northwind sample database:

content.code_html:
ProductID ProductName SupplierID CategoryID Unit Price
1 Chais 1 1 10 boxes x 20 bags 18
2 Chang 1 1 24 - 12 oz bottles 19
3 Aniseed Syrup 1 2 12 - 550 ml bottles 10
4 Chef Anton's Cajun Seasoning 1 2 48 - 6 oz jars 22
5 Chef Anton's Gumbo Mix 1 2 36 boxes 21.35

content.text: BETWEEN Example
The following SQL statement selects all products with a price between 10 and 20:
content.html: The following SQL statement selects all products with a price between 10 and 20:

syntaxHighlighting.text: SELECT * FROM ProductsWHERE Price BETWEEN 10 AND 20;

content.code: SELECT * FROM ProductsWHERE Price BETWEEN 10 AND 20;

syntax_highlighting.text: SELECT * FROM ProductsWHERE Price BETWEEN 10 AND 20;

content.code_html:
SELECT * FROM Products
WHERE Price BETWEEN 10 AND 20;

syntax_highlighting_data.text: SELECT * FROM ProductsWHERE Price BETWEEN 10 AND 20;

content.text: NOT BETWEEN Example
To display the products outside the range of the previous example, use NOT BETWEEN :
content.html: To display the products outside the range of the previous example, use NOT BETWEEN:

syntaxHighlighting.text: SELECT * FROM ProductsWHERE Price NOT BETWEEN 10 AND 20;

content.code: SELECT * FROM ProductsWHERE Price NOT BETWEEN 10 AND 20;

syntax_highlighting.text: SELECT * FROM ProductsWHERE Price NOT BETWEEN 10 AND 20;

content.code_html:
SELECT * FROM Products
WHERE Price NOT BETWEEN 10 AND 20;

syntax_highlighting_data.text: SELECT * FROM ProductsWHERE Price NOT BETWEEN 10 AND 20;

content.text: BETWEEN with IN Example
The following SQL statement selects all products with a price between 10 and 20. In addition; do not show products with a CategoryID of 1,2, or 3:
content.html: The following SQL statement selects all products with a price between 10 and 20. In addition; do not show products with a CategoryID of 1,2, or 3:

syntaxHighlighting.text: SELECT * FROM ProductsWHERE Price BETWEEN 10 AND 20AND CategoryID NOT IN (1,2,3);

content.code: SELECT * FROM ProductsWHERE Price BETWEEN 10 AND 20AND CategoryID NOT IN (1,2,3);

syntax_highlighting.text: SELECT * FROM ProductsWHERE Price BETWEEN 10 AND 20AND CategoryID NOT IN (1,2,3);

content.code_html:
SELECT * FROM Products
WHERE Price BETWEEN 10 AND 20
AND CategoryID NOT IN (1,2,3);

syntax_highlighting_data.text: SELECT * FROM ProductsWHERE Price BETWEEN 10 AND 20AND CategoryID NOT IN (1,2,3);

content.text: BETWEEN Text Values Example
The following SQL statement selects all products with a ProductName between "Carnarvon Tigers" and "Mozzarella di Giovanni":
content.html: The following SQL statement selects all products with a ProductName between "Carnarvon Tigers" and "Mozzarella di Giovanni":

syntaxHighlighting.text:
SELECT * FROM ProductsWHERE ProductName BETWEEN 'Carnarvon Tigers' AND 'Mozzarella 
  di Giovanni'ORDER BY ProductName;

content.code:
SELECT * FROM ProductsWHERE ProductName BETWEEN 'Carnarvon Tigers' AND 'Mozzarella
di Giovanni'ORDER BY ProductName;

syntax_highlighting.text:
SELECT * FROM ProductsWHERE ProductName BETWEEN 'Carnarvon Tigers' AND 'Mozzarella 
  di Giovanni'ORDER BY ProductName;

content.code_html:
SELECT * FROM Products
WHERE ProductName BETWEEN 'Carnarvon Tigers' AND 'Mozzarella di Giovanni'
ORDER BY ProductName;

syntax_highlighting_data.text:
SELECT * FROM ProductsWHERE ProductName BETWEEN 'Carnarvon Tigers' AND 'Mozzarella 
  di Giovanni'ORDER BY ProductName;

content.text: NOT BETWEEN Text Values Example
The following SQL statement selects all products with a ProductName not between "Carnarvon Tigers" and "Mozzarella di Giovanni":
content.html: The following SQL statement selects all products with a ProductName not between "Carnarvon Tigers" and "Mozzarella di Giovanni":

  di Giovanni'ORDER BY ProductName;

di Giovanni'ORDER BY ProductName;

content.text: Sample Table
Below is a selection from the "Orders" table in the Northwind sample database:
content.html: Below is a selection from the "Orders" table in the Northwind sample database:

content.text: BETWEEN Dates Example
The following SQL statement selects all orders with an OrderDate between '01-July-1996' and '31-July-1996':
content.html: The following SQL statement selects all orders with an OrderDate between '01-July-1996' and '31-July-1996':

syntaxHighlighting.text: SELECT * FROM OrdersWHERE OrderDate BETWEEN '1996-07-01' AND '1996-07-31';

content.code: SELECT * FROM OrdersWHERE OrderDate BETWEEN '1996-07-01' AND '1996-07-31';

syntax_highlighting.text: SELECT * FROM OrdersWHERE OrderDate BETWEEN '1996-07-01' AND '1996-07-31';

content.code_html:
SELECT * FROM Orders
WHERE OrderDate BETWEEN '1996-07-01' AND '1996-07-31';

syntax_highlighting_data.text: SELECT * FROM OrdersWHERE OrderDate BETWEEN '1996-07-01' AND '1996-07-31';
